scripts.start: sh clean.sh && docker build -t docker-demo . && docker run -dp 9002:8080 --name docker-demo docker-demo
scripts.save: sh clean.sh && docker build -t docker-demo . && docker save -o docker-demo.tar docker-demo
scripts.load: sh clean.sh && docker load -i ./docker-demo.tar && docker run -dp 9002:8080 --name docker-demo docker-demo
